title: How can an individual get the ultimate truth of life? - Quora

response.answer_text: imagine this :- you are out with your best -friend on an evening walk, eating ice cream and chilling and both laughing on an old funny moment while crossing the street . your attention gets diverted and suddenly a car speeds past you both while just brushing you off and you felt the speeding wind ,and heard a loud THUD . after 2 sec of getting back in your senses you realize your friend got hit . the car sped off and his/her body is lying on the road , TWO days later after all the incident and consequences you are lying in your bed at night sulking in the memory of your loss . BUT JUST THEN BOOM . your conscious gives you a gratifying thought . that IT WAS NOT YOU . soon you introspect and realize how close you were to death and may be if it was 2 inches more or less you wouldnt be having this conversation with yourself . so here’s you answer : be grateful each and every day for the sun you see in the morning , your family faces and your friends and relatives . even if you don’t have that career you want or marks your require or the charm you need to woo your crush , dont beat yourself up over little thing in life . you have food , water , you have air in your lungs and healthy body AND mind with no disease , because as you wilL GET the lesson from this film too : EVERY DAY ABOVE EARTH IS A GOOD DAY SO THE ULTIMATE TRUTH IS : you are complete , you are whole you dont need ferrari or million dollars to be happy . it is your default behaviour when you are born but with the challenging situations and circumstances in life , we forget to feel happy and complete as we grow up ! so this is your time, hug yourself ,your mom ,dad even if it feels awkward ,because they , you are atleast alive and dererve it.
An individual gets to the ultimate truth of life when he/she is brave enough to accept themselves with all their flaws.
Experience and taking responsibility for your mistakes will give you the ultimate truth of life
By breaking your limitations of MIND,BODY AND HEART EACH DAY. :)
By following self wisdom. @mpdopex IG DM for more. Thank you,
